snippet: The windblown grass has become a major nuisance, leaving the town inundated with tumbleweeds and drawing the attention of the global news media.
abstract: Plant known as hairy panic leaves areas of Wangaratta, Australia, overrun with tumbleweeds; windblown grass, which thrives in warm, dry conditions, has become major nuisance in area.
lead_paragraph: The windblown grass has become a major nuisance, leaving the town inundated with tumbleweeds and drawing the attention of the global news media.

headline.main: ‘Hairy Panic’ (a Plant) Strikes Australian Town of Wangaratta
headline.print_headline: ‘Hairy Panic’ Grips a Town in Southern Australia
